title: Statistical Analysis
text: If you need to learn more about how to interpret ANOVA results, I do suggest this link (https://www.datanovia.com/en/lessons/anova-in-r/) .

title: Statistical Analysis
text: If you need to learn more about how to interpret ANOVA results, I do suggest this link (https://www.datanovia.com/en/lessons/anova-in-r/) .

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Libraries


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(rstatix)
library(plotly)
library(ggpubr)
library(DT)
library(htmltools)

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Load dataset


Code
dataset = read_excel("InVitroAA.xlsx", sheet = "megazord")

title: Statistical Analysis
Statistical Analysis
text:
Descriptive Analysis


Code
summary_stats = dataset |> 
  group_by(cell, time, treatment) |> 
  get_summary_stats(abs, type = "mean_sd")

tagList(datatable(summary_stats,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))








Code
p1 = ggboxplot(dataset, 
               x = "treatment", 
               y = "abs", 
               fill = "cell",
               facet = c("time"))

p1

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Assumptions


Code
#outliers

check_outliers = dataset |> 
  group_by(cell, time, treatment) |> 
  identify_outliers(abs)

tagList(datatable(check_outliers,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))








Code
#normality

test_normality = dataset |> 
  group_by(cell, time, treatment) |> 
  shapiro_test(abs)

tagList(datatable(test_normality,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))








Code
#qq plot

p2 = ggqqplot(dataset, 
              "abs", 
              ggtheme = theme_bw()) +
  facet_grid(treatment + time ~ cell, 
             labeller = "label_both")

p2











Code
#variance homogeneity

test_homogeneity = dataset |>  
  levene_test(abs ~ time*treatment*cell)

tagList(datatable(test_homogeneity,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Univariate Analyses


Code
#treatment

pwc1 = dataset |>
  group_by(cell, time) |> 
  pairwise_t_test(
    abs ~ treatment, paired = FALSE,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
  )

tagList(datatable(pwc1,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))






Code
#add p-values to the boxplot

pwc1 = pwc1 %>% 
  add_xy_position(x = "treatment", dodge = 0.4)

p3 = ggboxplot(dataset, 
               x = "treatment", 
               y = "abs", 
               fill = "cell",
               facet = "time") +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pwc1, 
                     label = "p.adj.signif",
                     tip.length = 0, 
                     hide.ns = TRUE) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.01, 0.1)))

p3











Code
#time

pwc2 = dataset |>
  group_by(cell, treatment) |> 
  pairwise_t_test(
    abs ~ time, paired = FALSE,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
  )

tagList(datatable(pwc2,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))






Code
# add p-values to the boxplot

pwc2 = pwc2 %>% 
  add_xy_position(x = "treatment", dodge = 0.4)

p4 = ggboxplot(dataset, 
               x = "treatment", 
               y = "abs", 
               fill = "time",
               facet = "cell") +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pwc2, 
                     label = "p.adj.signif",
                     tip.length = 0, 
                     hide.ns = TRUE) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.01, 0.1)))

p4











Code
#cell

pwc3 = dataset |>
  group_by(time, treatment) |> 
  pairwise_t_test(
    abs ~ cell, paired = FALSE,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
  )

tagList(datatable(pwc3,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))






Code
# add p-values to the boxplot

pwc3 = pwc3 %>% 
  add_xy_position(x = "treatment", dodge = 0.4)

p5 = ggboxplot(dataset, 
               x = "treatment", 
               y = "abs", 
               fill = "cell",
               facet = "time") +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pwc3, 
                     label = "p.adj.signif",
                     tip.length = 0, 
                     hide.ns = TRUE) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.01, 0.1)))

p5

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Three-way ANOVA


Code
test_three_way = dataset |> 
  anova_test(abs ~ cell*time*treatment) |> 
  get_anova_table()

tagList(datatable(test_three_way,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))

title: Statistical Analysis
text:
Wettability Analysis


Code
wettability = read_excel("wettability.xlsx", sheet = 1)

wettability = wettability |> 
  mutate(groups = as.factor(groups))

pairwise_comparisons = wettability |> 
  t_test(contact_angle~groups, 
         p.adjust.method = "fdr")

tagList(datatable(pairwise_comparisons,
                  autoHideNavigation = TRUE,
                  options = list(iDisplayLength = 25)))
